findings.title: No high severity issues found.
findings.description: The audit report did not identify any high-severity security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: No medium severity issues found.
findings.description: The audit report did not identify any medium severity security issues.

findings.title: No low severity issues found.
findings.description: The audit report did not identify any low severity security issues.

findings.title: Only owner can call InterestPay() function
findings.description: The InterestPay() function, which allocates staked amounts, can only be called by the contract owner.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to modify critical parameters and call sensitive functions.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum amount for stake.
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the minimum staking amount, which could lead to potential security risks and unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Modifiable Rate Values
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to change basic, supreme, performer, and turbo rate values.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Modifiable Tax, Liquidity, and Burn Fee
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to change tax, liquidity, and burn fee, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change liquidity and tax reward addresses
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify liquidity and tax reward addresses, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can set reduction exclusion
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to set reduction exclusion, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Unrestricted Access to stakeFromTime() Function
findings.description: The contract owner has unrestricted access to call the stakeFromTime() function, potentially leading to unintended consequences.
